title.narrative: Better Education Service Delivery for All

description.narrative: To increase equitable access for out-of-school children and improve literacy in focus states, and strengthen accountability for results, in basic education in Nigeria.

condition.narrative: No less than three (3) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall update the Operation Implementation Manual in form andsubstance satisfactory to the Bank
Schedule 2 Section G.1 No less than three (3) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall update the OperationImplementation Manual in form and substance satisfactory to the Bank

Schedule 2 Section V The Recipient shall ensure that withdrawals shall only be made for expenditures not financed by other sourcesof financings, including the IDA financing provided under the Better Education Service Delivery for All Operation (Program CreditNo. 6095 and Project Credit No. 6096)

The Recipient shall ensure that withdrawals shall only be made for expenditures not financed by other sources of financings,including the IDA financing provided under the Better Education Service Delivery for All Operation (Program Credit No. 6095 andProject Credit No. 6096)

title.narrative: Improved literacy rates in focus states, by state
Reduced number of out-of-school children in focus states, by gender
Schools adopting primary 1-3 intensive literacy programs in focus states
Total states completing state basic education plan and progress report on Universal Basic Education program implementation, approved by Universal Basic Education Commission (UBEC)
Total states implementing and publishing the Annual School Census (ASC), verified by school-based management committees (SBMCs)
Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Publicly disclosed Universal Basic Education program annual progress report
Publicly disclosed Universal Basic Education program strategic plan reflecting annual progress reports and program evaluation findings
System of national learning assessment developed and implemented
Universal Basic Education program evaluation and report completed
OAK states: Number of students from underserved communities with access to schools and adequate learning conditions for basic education (by gender)
OAK states: Number of States completing community mapping of access to basic education for children with special needs
OAK states: Number of States conducting digital data collection on students, teachers and schools
OAK states: Number of states conducting school infrastructure audit and developing school network of all Primary and Junior Secondary schools
OAK states: Number of states developing and issuing need-based teacher deployment policy
OAK states: Number of states establishing learning assessment system
OAK states: Number of states publishing education expenditures including SUBEB program expenditures and outputs
OAK States: Number of teachers conducting termly student assessments
Teachers receiving individualized reports on how to improve their teaching practice based on their interactions with pedagogical support officers and the results of termly assessments (by gender)
OAK states: Number of teachers completing relevant training to enhance and reinforce their curriculum knowledge and pedagogical skills
OAK states: Number of teachers deployed to schools with high PTR
OAK states: Number of SBMCs in underserved communities receive infrastructure improvement grants
